document.full_text: juliano mer khamis was a renowned actor, director and political activist who embodied the israeli-arab conflict and embraced its complexities in a way that few could.
document.title: jenin journal: building a stage for mideast peace before the final curtain
lines_and_colors: juliano mer khamis was a renowned actor, director and political activist who embodied the israeli-arab conflict and embraced its complexities in a way that few could.
